name: MELBOURNE FLIGHT ACADEMY PTY LTD
about: Melbourne Flight Academy Pty Ltd, operating as Flight Academy Australia (FAA), is a renowned aviation training institution based at Melbourne’s Essendon Airport. With over 30 years of experience, FAA specializes in providing high-quality airline pilot training for Australia and the Asia-Pacific region. Our programs include integrated courses and diplomas from Recreational Pilot License (RPL) to Commercial Pilot License (CPL), ATPL, and Multi-Crew Training. We boast a modern aircraft fleet and state-of-the-art facilities, ensuring a safe and comprehensive learning environment. Led by Michael Lanza, our team of experienced instructors and industry professionals are committed to producing highly competent pilots. FAA is a CASA Registered Training Organisation, emphasizing safety and professionalism, and has a strong track record of placing graduates in successful aviation careers.
services: ["Multi Engine Instrument Rating\nPrivate IFR Instrument Rating\nNight VFR Rating Endorsement"]
